TITLE: Frontend Developer
NAME: Dennis Schwarz
ABOUT_ME_INFO: Hi, I'm a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Neunkirchen Saar. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
LOCATION: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Saarland and remotely.
COQNITION: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
QUALITY: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
JOURNEY: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILL_SET_CONTACT_ME: Feel free to contact me, I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
SKILL_SET_TOOLTIP: I have a special interest in learning
EXPLORE: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with project to see my skills in action.
PROJECT_JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECT_SHARKIE: Platformer game inspired by classic arcade games. Play as a chicken character and overcome various obstacles.
PROJECT_DA_BUBBLE: A project management tool built with Angular and Firebase, with features for tracking project progress and tasks.
COLLEAGUES_ABOUT_ME: What my colleagues say about me
COLLEAGUE_H_JANISCH: Dennis has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.
COLLEAGUE_T_SCHULZ: I had the good fortune of working with Dennis on a project. He always stayed calm and made sure our team was set up for success.
COLLEAGUE_P_BRAUN: Apart from Dennis efficient way of working, he also showed a strong commitment to the team.

DATA_COLLECTION: 2. Collection and Storage of Personal Data as well as Type and Purpose of Use
DATA_COLLECTION_WEBSITE_TEXT: When you access our website, the browser used on your device automatically sends information to the server of our website. This information is temporarily stored in a so-called log file. The following information is collected without your intervention and stored until automatic deletion:
IP_ADDRESS: IP address of the requesting computer,
FILE_NAME_URL: Name and URL of the retrieved file,
REFERRER_URL: Website from which access is made (referrer URL),
BROWSER_OS_PROVIDER: Browser used and possibly the operating system of your computer, as well as the name of your access provider.
DATA_COLLECTION_PURPOSES: This data is processed for the following purposes:
PURPOSE_LIST_1: Ensuring a smooth connection setup of the website,
PURPOSE_LIST_2: Ensuring comfortable use of our website,
PURPOSE_LIST_3: Evaluation of system security and stability, as well as
LEGAL_BASE: The legal basis for data processing is Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. f GDPR. Our legitimate interest follows from the purposes listed above for data collection. In no case do we use the collected data to draw conclusions about your person.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE: b) When using our contact form
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT: If you send us a message via the contact form, the following personal data will be processed by us:
CONTACT_FORM_MESSAGE: Your message in the free text field.
CONTACT_FORM_PROCESSING: The processing of this data is based on your voluntary consent in accordance with Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. a GDPR. Your email address is used solely for processing and responding to your request. Without this information, we cannot process your request.
CONTACT_FORM_USAGE: The data provided in the contact form will only be used to process your request and will not be passed on to third parties.
DATA_STORAGE_DELETION_TEXT: Your data will only be stored as long as necessary for the processing of your request. Once the purpose of the data storage is no longer applicable or you revoke your consent to data processing, your data will be deleted, unless legal retention periods prevent this.
DATA_SHARING_TEXT: Your personal data will not be shared with third parties unless:
DATA_SHARING_LIST_1: You have given your explicit consent (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. a GDPR),
DATA_SHARING_LIST_2: the disclosure is necessary to fulfill a contract with you (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. b GDPR),
DATA_SHARING_LIST_3: the disclosure is necessary to fulfill a legal obligation (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. c GDPR), or
DATA_SHARING_LIST_4: the disclosure is based on our legitimate interest or the legitimate interest of a third party (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. f GDPR).
YOUR_RIGHTS_LIST_1: in accordance with Art. 15 GDPR, to request information about your personal data processed by us,
YOUR_RIGHTS_LIST_2: in accordance with Art. 16 GDPR, to request the immediate correction of incorrect or completion of your personal data stored by us,
YOUR_RIGHTS_LIST_3: in accordance with Art. 17 GDPR, to request the deletion of your personal data stored by us, unless processing is necessary to fulfill a legal obligation or to exercise a legal claim,
YOUR_RIGHTS_LIST_4: in accordance with Art. 18 GDPR, to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data,
YOUR_RIGHTS_LIST_5: in accordance with Art. 20 GDPR, to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format or to request the transfer to another controller, and
YOUR_RIGHTS_LIST_6: in accordance with Art. 7 para. 3 GDPR, to revoke your consent at any time.
RIGHT_TO_WITHDRAW_TEXT: You have the right to revoke your consent to the processing of your data at any time. The revocation must be in writing or sent by email to us. The legality of the data processing carried out until the revocation remains unaffected by the revocation.
CHANGES_TO_POLICY_TEXT: We reserve the right to amend this privacy policy to comply with current legal requirements or to implement changes in our services in the privacy policy. The new privacy policy will apply on your next visit.
RESPONSIBLE_PARAGRAPH: Responsible for content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
LIABILITY_FOR_CONTENT_TEXT_1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 para.1 TMG under general laws. However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obligated as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
LIABILITY_FOR_CONTENT_TEXT_2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general law remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point at which a specific legal infringement becomes known. Upon becoming aware of such legal infringements, we will remove the content immediately.
LIABILITY_FOR_LINKS_TEXT_1: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, the content of which we have no influence over. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked sites is always responsible for their content. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not discernible at the time of linking.
LIABILITY_FOR_LINKS_TEXT_2: However, a permanent content control of the linked pages is unreasonable without concrete evidence of a legal violation. Upon becoming aware of legal infringements, we will remove such links immediately.
COPYRIGHT_TEXT_1: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The duplication, processing, distribution, and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are permitted for private, non-commercial use only.
COPYRIGHT_TEXT_2: Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. If you still become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. Upon becoming aware of legal infringements, we will remove such content immediately.
PRIVACY_POLICY_TEXT_1: The use of our website is generally possible without providing personal data. As far as personal data (such as name, address, or email addresses) are collected on our pages, this is always done on a voluntary basis, as far as possible. These data will not be passed on to third parties without your express consent.
PRIVACY_POLICY_TEXT_2: We point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g., when communicating by email) may have security vulnerabilities. Complete protection of the data from access by third parties is not possible.
